ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model
Class LocalRepository

java.lang.Object
  ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model.LocalRepository

public class LocalRepository
extends java.lang.Object

Manages a SQLite database stored locally on the phone memory.

Creates a new Task, with no title, description, or requirements *NOTE: The provided ID is used as this Task's ID. It MUST not conflict with a current ID.

Returns:
the Task, with no non-housekeeping values yet set
